name: ecoreflect ltd
goal:
Focusing on climate, environment and sustainability issues in marine and land based scenarios with the aim to explore and understand 'eco' (economy, ecology, eco systems) and 'reflect' on the linkages and interconnectivity with 'eco' that governs the way our world works.

Set up in 2013 by Anne-Marie Warris her belief is that we can have a low carbon world which to achieve we need balance the three pillars of sustainability using innovation; improvement and implementation.
euInitiatives:
EU MRV for shipping both the MR and VA elements via ESSF
CEN work on environmental standards
